df-phl
blocks.content: Define the class of all pre-Hilbert spaces (inner product spaces) over arbitrary fields with involution. (Some textbook definitions are more restrictive and require the field of scalars to be the field of real or complex numbers). (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2011.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-phl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cphl, crab(s0, clvec, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cip, cv(s0)), wsbc(s3, cfv(csca, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s3), csr), wral(s4, cv(s1), w3a(wcel(cmpt(s5, cv(s1), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s4))), co(cv(s0), clmhm, cfv(crglmod, cv(s3)))), wi(wceq(co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s4)), cfv(c0g, cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s4), cfv(c0g, cv(s0)))), wral(s5, cv(s1), wceq(cfv(cfv(cstv, cv(s3)), co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s5))), co(cv(s5), cv(s2), cv(s4))))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-phl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ PreHil = { s0 ‚àà LVec |[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(¬∑ ` s0)/ s2][(Scalar ` s0)/ s3](s3 ‚àà *Ring ‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s5 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s5[s2]s4))‚àà(s0[LMHom](ringLMod ` s3))‚àß((s4[s2]s4)=(0 ` s3)‚Üí s4 =(0 ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s5 ‚àà s1,((*r ` s3)`(s4[s2]s5))=(s5[s2]s4)))))}
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
}

blocks.name: df-ipf
blocks.content: Define the inner product function. Usually we will use ` .i ` directly instead of ` .if ` , and they have the same behavior in most cases. The main advantage of ` .if ` is that it is a guaranteed function ( ~ ipffn ), while ` .i ` only has closure ( ~ ipcl ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: isphl
blocks.content: The predicate "is a generalized pre-Hilbert (inner product) space". (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cstv, c1))

blocks.name: phllvec

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))

  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cstv, cfv(csca, c0)))

  simp3bi(c0 ‚àà PreHil, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4))‚àß((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c4)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((*r ` c4)`(hs0[c5]s0))=(s0[c5]hs0)))), c0 ‚àà LVec, c4 ‚àà *Ring)
  isphl(hs0, s0, c0, c4, c2, c5, (0 ` c4), (0 ` c0), (*r ` c4))

  ralimi(hs0, c2, ((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4))‚àß((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c4)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((*r ` c4)`(hs0[c5]s0))=(s0[c5]hs0))), (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4)))
  simp1((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4)), ((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c4)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,((*r ` c4)`(hs0[c5]s0))=(s0[c5]hs0)))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4)), c3 ‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4)))
  eleq1d((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(s0[c5]hs0)), (c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c4)), c3, hs0 = c1)

blocks.name: ipcl
blocks.content: Closure of the inner product operation in a pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
} = {
  3com23(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c5))
  stoic3(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c5), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, c3), c5)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c3, c2)), wral(hs0, c2, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, c3), c5)), wf(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)), c2, c5))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c3, c2)), wf(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)), c2, c5), wcel(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)), co(c0, clmhm, cfv(crglmod, c6))))
  phllmhm(hs0, c0, c3, c2, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)), c6, c4)
  lmhmf(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)), c0, cfv(crglmod, c6), c2, c5)
  eqtri(c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(crglmod, c6)), cfv(cbs, c6))
  rlmbas(c6)
  fmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3), c5, cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, c2, co(cv(hs0), c4, c3)))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, c3), c5), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c5))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), c4, c3), c5, co(c1, c4, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), c5))
}

thm ipcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1[c4]c3)‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(¬∑ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)
} = {
  3com23(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[c4]c3)‚àà c5)
  stoic3(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c3 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, (c1[c4]c3)‚àà c5, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c4]c3)‚àà c5))
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,(hs0[c4]c3)‚àà c5), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3)): c2 ‚Üí c5))
  syl((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3)): c2 ‚Üí c5), (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c6)))
  phllmhm(hs0, c0, c3, c2, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3)), c6, c4)
  lmhmf((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3)), c0, (ringLMod ` c6), c2, c5)
  eqtri(c5, (Base `(ringLMod ` c6)), (Base ` c6))
  rlmbas(c6)
  fmpt(hs0, c2, (hs0[c4]c3), c5, (hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3)))
  eqid((hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs0[c4]c3)))
  rspccva(hs0, c2, c1, (hs0[c4]c3)‚àà c5, (c1[c4]c3)‚àà c5)
  eleq1d((hs0[c4]c3), c5, (c1[c4]c3), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, c4, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c1[c4]c3)‚àà c5)

blocks.name: ipcj
blocks.content: Conjugate of an inner product in a pre-Hilbert space. Equation I1 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ipcj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cstv, c6))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1)))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, cphl), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1)), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cphl), wral(hs0, c2, wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))), co(c0, clmhm, cfv(crglmod, c6))), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0)))))))
  simp3bi(wcel(c0, cphl), wral(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))), co(c0, clmhm, cfv(crglmod, c6))), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(c6, csr))
  isphl(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c2, c5, cfv(c0g, c6), cfv(c0g, c0), c4)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c6))
  ralimi(hs0, c2, w3a(wcel(cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))), co(c0, clmhm, cfv(crglmod, c6))), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0)))))
  simp3(wcel(cmpt(hs1, c2, co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))), co(c0, clmhm, cfv(crglmod, c6))), wi(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0g, c6)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(hs1, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0)))))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, wceq(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, c1)))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c4, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  fvoveq1(cv(hs0), c1, c4, c5, cv(hs1))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c5)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, c1), cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  fveq2d(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1)), co(c1, c5, c3), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c3, c1, c5)
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c3, c5, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, cv(hs1))), co(cv(hs1), c5, c1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cfv(c4, co(c1, c5, c3)), co(c3, c5, c1)))
}

thm ipcj(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=(c3[c5]c1))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Scalar ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(¬∑ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(*r ` c6)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=(c3[c5]c1))
  syl5com(c0 ‚àà PreHil, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=(c3[c5]c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0))))
  syl(c0 ‚àà PreHil, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0))), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c6))‚àß((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0)))))
  simp3bi(c0 ‚àà PreHil, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c2,((hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c6))‚àß((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0)))), c0 ‚àà LVec, c6 ‚àà *Ring)
  isphl(hs0, hs1, c0, c6, c2, c5, (0 ` c6), (0 ` c0), c4)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c6))
  ralimi(hs0, c2, ((hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c6))‚àß((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0))), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0)))
  simp3((hs1 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶(hs1[c5]hs0))‚àà(c0[LMHom](ringLMod ` c6)), ((hs0[c5]hs0)=(0 ` c6)‚Üí hs0 =(0 ` c0)), ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c2,(c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0)))
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3, c2, (c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]hs0), (c4 `(c1[c5]c3))=(c3[c5]c1), (c4 `(c1[c5]hs1))=(hs1[c5]c1))
  eqeq12d((c4 `(hs0[c5]hs1)), (hs1[c5]hs0), (c4 `(c1[c5]hs1)), (hs1[c5]c1), hs0 = c1)
  fvoveq1(hs0, c1, c4, c5, hs1)
  oveq2(hs0, c1, hs1, c5)

  fveq2d(c4, (c1[c5]hs1), (c1[c5]c3), hs1 = c3)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: iporthcom
blocks.content: Orthogonality (meaning inner product is 0) is commutative. (Contributed by NM, 17-Apr-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iporthcom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c6))
} = {
  bitr3d(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c5), wceq(cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), c5)))
  syl12anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wceq(cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), c5)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), c5)), wf1(cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c5, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  3syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wf1(cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, c6)), wcel(c6, csr), wf1o(cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, c6)))
  srngf1o(c6, cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cbs, c6))
  f1of1(cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, c6))
  f1fveq(cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, c6), co(c1, c4, c3), c5)
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), c5), co(c3, c4, c1), c5, w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), co(c1, c4, c3)), co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cfv(cstv, c6), co(c1, c4, c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), co(c1, c4, c3)), cfv(cfv(cstv, c6), co(c1, c4, c3))), wcel(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(cbs, c6)))
  ipcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c6), c6)
  stafval(co(c1, c4, c3), cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cstf, c6), cfv(cstv, c6), c6)
  ipcj(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cstv, c6), c4, c6)
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(cstf, c6), c5), c5, cfv(cfv(cstv, c6), c5), w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)))

blocks.name: ipffval
blocks.content: The inner product operation as a function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2015.)

thm ipffval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c1, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cip, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cipf, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {

blocks.name: ip2eq
blocks.content: Two vectors are equal iff their inner products with all other vectors are equal. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ip2eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wb(wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), co(cv(s0), c4, c3)))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  impbid2(w3a(wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c3), wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, c1), co(cv(s0), c4, c3))))

thm ip2eq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c1 = c3 ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c4]c1)=(s0[c4]c3))))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(¬∑ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  impbid2((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), c1 = c3, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c4]c1)=(s0[c4]c3)))
  ralrimivw(s0, c2, c1 = c3, (s0[c4]c1)=(s0[c4]c3))
  oveq2(c1, c3, s0, c4)

  syl((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c2,(s0[c4]c1)=(s0[c4]c3))‚Üí((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)=((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3)), (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)‚àà c2)
  rspcv(s0, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3), c2, (s0[c4]c1)=(s0[c4]c3), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)=((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3))
  eqeq12d((s0[c4]c1), (s0[c4]c3), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3), s0 =(c1[(-g ` c0)]c3))
  oveq1(s0, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3), c4, c1)
  oveq1(s0, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3), c4, c3)
  3bitr3d((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)=((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3), c1 = c3, (((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)[(-g `(Scalar ` c0))]((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3))=(0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)=(0 ` c0))
  bitr3d((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)[(-g `(Scalar ` c0))]((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3))=(0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)=(0 ` c0), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4](c1[(-g ` c0)]c3))=(0 `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqeq1d(((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4](c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)), (((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)[(-g `(Scalar ` c0))]((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3)), (c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2))
  syl13anc((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4](c1[(-g ` c0)]c3))=(((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1)[(-g `(Scalar ` c0))]((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3)), c0 ‚àà PreHil, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  ipsubdi(c0, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3), c2, c1, c3, c4, (-g ` c0), (-g `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4](c1[(-g ` c0)]c3))=(0 `(Scalar ` c0))‚Üî(c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)=(0 ` c0)), c0 ‚àà PreHil, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)‚àà c2)

  syl((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), (Scalar ` c0)‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà LMod)

  lmodfgrp(c0, (Scalar ` c0))

  simp2(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  ipcl(c0, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3), c2, c1, c4, (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà PreHil ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà c2), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3)‚àà(Base `(Scalar ` c0)), c0 ‚àà PreHil, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà LMod)
  lmodvsubcl(c0, c1, c2, c3, (-g ` c0))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2)
  ipcl(c0, (c1[(-g ` c0)]c3), c2, c3, c4, (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), (Scalar ` c0))
  eqid((Scalar ` c0))
  grpsubeq0((Scalar ` c0), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1), (Base `(Scalar ` c0)), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3), (-g `(Scalar ` c0)), (0 `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqid((Base `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqid((0 `(Scalar ` c0)))
  eqid((-g `(Scalar ` c0)))
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)=(0 ` c0)‚Üî c1 = c3), c0 ‚àà Grp)
  syl(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c0 ‚àà Grp, c0 ‚àà LMod)

  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((-g ` c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c1, c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c1), ((c1[(-g ` c0)]c3)[c4]c3))

blocks.content: Properties that determine a pre-Hilbert (inner product) space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)

thm isphld(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10, class c11, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cphl))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cvsca, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cip, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c6, cfv(csca, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c8, cfv(cplusg, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c9, cfv(cmulr, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c10, cfv(cstv, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c11, cfv(c0g, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, clvec))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, csr))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c7))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c7), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s3), c1))), wceq(co(co(co(cv(s2), c3, cv(s0)), c2, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s3)), co(co(cv(s2), c9, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s3))), c8, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s3)))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s0)), c11)), wceq(cv(s0), c5))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cfv(c10, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  syl3anbrc(w0, wcel(c0, cphl), wcel(c0, clvec), wcel(cfv(csca, c0), csr), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), w3a(wcel(cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, c0), cv(s0))), co(c0, clmhm, cfv(crglmod, cfv(csca, c0)))), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, c0), cv(s0)), cfv(c0g, cfv(csca, c0))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cstv, cfv(csca, c0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cip, c0), cv(s1))), co(cv(s1), cfv(cip, c0), cv(s0)))))))

blocks.name: phlpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same components (properties), one is a pre-Hilbert space iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ssipeq
blocks.content: The inner product on a subspace equals the inner product on the parent space. (Contributed by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: phssipval
blocks.content: The inner product on a subspace in terms of the inner product on the parent space. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (Revised by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: phssip
blocks.content: The inner product (as a function) on a subspace is a restriction of the inner product (as a function) on the parent space. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (Revised by AV, 19-Oct-2021.)

  sylan(c0 ‚àà PreHil, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚àà(SubGrp ` c0), c0 ‚àà LMod)
  phllmod(c0)
